```{r setup}
library(rstapDP)
library(tidyverse)
library(coda)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
data("ClusterScales_one")

fit <- fdp_staplm(y = ClusterScales_one$BMI,
                  Z = cbind(1,matrix(ClusterScales_one$sex,ncol=1)),
                  X = ClusterScales_one$dists,
                  tau_0 = 1,
                  alpha_a = 1, 
                  alpha_b = 1,
                  K = 5,
                  iter_max = 10000,
                  burn_in = 9000,
                  thin = 1,
                  seed = 43431)

```
 
 
```{r}
plot(fit$beta)
```


```{r}
plot_pairs(fit)
```
